document_data.name: Chsalbreian
document_data.mainbody: [[Chsalbreian]] was a [[Zhentarim]] [[mage]] of the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Chsalbreian formed part of a squad of [[Zhentarim]] mages.
document_data.Relationships: Other mages in the same squad to which Chsalbreian belonged were [[Arluth]] and [[Sundarth]].
document_data.History: In {{yearlink|1357}}, Sundarth reported to [[Manshoon]] that a group of mages seeking [[spellfire]] in [[Sembia]] was attacked, first by [[Harpers]] and then by [[Cult of the Dragon]] forces. He named Chsalbreian as one of the casualties.
